title: ContextSuite Semantic Event Contextual Awareness
description: Schema for contextual awareness information related to an entity in a semantic event.

type.description: Type of contextual information (e.g., Description, Summary, Conditions).

entity_type.description: The type of the entity this context refers to (e.g., 'Currency', 'Product').

entity_gid.description: The Graph UUID of the entity this context refers to.

entity_wid.description: The Wikidata ID of the entity this context refers to.
